const arma::mat &  W,
arma::mat &  H 
) [inline, static]

The update function that actually updates the H matrix.

The function takes in all the matrices and only changes the value of the H matrix.

Parameters:
V Input matrix to be factorized.
W Basis matrix.
H Encoding matrix to updated.
